comment.text:
@limb,

I don't get why only a small sub-set of gst1 libraries are updated along 1.22.7.
Please, can you update all at the same time (ideally in a side-tag) or none.

Feel feel to escalate to devel ml if any problem.
Thanks in advance.
Because I didn't realize how tightly coupled they were. I'll get on that, thank you!
